Name: Fujii
About the game: Fujii is a magical journey through dreamlike landscapes waiting to be explored. With a serene soundtrack enveloping your surroundings, you will plant, water, and grow a lush garden full of color and wonder. ðŸŒ¿ FEATURES ðŸŒ¿ Hiking across three organic biomes and discovering their enchanted flowers and plants Collecting seeds to grow colorful landscapes and cultivating your own unique garden A Relaxing meditative soundtrack that enhances the peaceful and whimsical VR experience by French artist and composer, Norman Bambi Introducing critters and insect life into your garden with the help of your adorable gnome friend Created by Funktronic Labs , the makers of the award-winning games Wave Break , and VR titles Cosmic Trip and Starbear: Taxi .
